Title: Fear and Loathing at the Fundraiser
Plot: Meredith convinces Hank to escort her to an environmental fundraiser. Coincidentally Bill and Karen are at the same event, where Karen makes a scene. Also, Hank runs into Dani and Charlie while they are in his office.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual content that may offend
GuestStars: John Scarangello, Chris Williams, Camille Langfield, Amy Price-Francis, Robert Merrill, Kathy Christopherson
